_instructions: 1. Go to https://developer.safaricom.co.ke and create an account.
2. Create an app to receive Consumer Key and Consumer Secret.
3. For sandbox: use the default shortcode 174379 and the sandbox passkey below.
4. Set your callback_url to your ngrok HTTPS URL + /api/v1/mpesa/callback
5. For production: use your M-Pesa shortcode and real passkey from Safaricom.
6. NEVER commit this file with real production credentials to git.
7. Prefer environment variables (MPESA_CONSUMER_KEY etc.) for production.
_sandbox_test_note: Use the Safaricom sandbox simulator at https://developer.safaricom.co.ke/APIs/MpesaExpressSimulate to trigger callbacks.
